All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Employee
Entity class to represent the employees table.
EmployeeApplication
 
EmployeeController
EmployeeController class handles all the RESTful API endpoints related to Employee operations.
EmployeeControllerTest
 
EmployeeNotFoundException
Custom exception to handle employee not found scenario.
EmployeeRepository
Repository interface for Employee entity.
EmployeeService
Service class for Employee entity.
EmployeeServiceTest
 
EmployeeStatus
Enum representing the status of an employee.
EmployeeVO
Represents the data of an employee in a simplified form, used for business logic or API responses.
ErrorEmployee
Represents an error response when an employee is not found or there is an issue with the request.
ErrorLog
ErrorLog entity that maps to the 'error_log' table in the database.
ErrorLogRepository
Repository interface for accessing the error_log table.
ErrorLogService
Service class to handle business logic for error logs.
ErrorLogServiceTest
 
Errors
 
EventLog
Entity class to represent the event_log table.
EventLogRepository
Repository interface for accessing the event_log table.
EventLogService
Service class to handle business logic for event logs.
EventLogServiceTest
 
EventType
Represents the different types of events that can occur in the system.
Gender
Enum representing the gender of an employee.
ServletInitializer
 
UnknownErrorException
Custom exception to represent an unknown or uncontrolled error.
